Dare or Dare: The player next to you gets to chose a person for you to hit on. If you refuse drink!
Dare or Dare: Take a drink from another table or else drink.
Dare or Dare: Give access to your instagram to the player on your left to upload a post. Else drink.
Dare or Dare: Give access to your facebook to the player across from you to upload a post. Else drink.
Dare or Dare: Give access to your twitter to the player on your right to upload a post. Else drink.
Dare or Dare: Give your phone to the player of different sex closest to you to send a text to a contact of their choice or else drink.
Dare or Dare: Call your mom and put the player to your right to talk to her or drink.

If there is a player that had a crush on another player drinks.

SURPRISE ATTACK! Force someone to drink on your behalf!
Describe your day using only "I" as vowel. If you fail drink.
